Stevens, Based on the reading of the following poems* The Snow
Man? Sunday Horning? The Ida** of Order at Key West? The woman

Series III* Tape Ct Hm mmmmkl nmmmim A Beadinf-Uotore
on Wallace Stevens's *fhe Idea of Order at ley West*# The

imputed to the auditor, and a review of its causes# The early
20th century 'revolution of form* is sketched as the source,
through its excesses, of a general public alienation from new
poetry# Against this Background, *fhe Idea of Order at Key
West- is read# The simplicity and traditionalism of It* form
end language are then noted# The argument proceeds that those
who dwell on the formal obscurities of 20th century poetry are
■one revolution Behind11? that the Best poetry of today ip Being
written within a newly integrated formal tradition* and within
established convention* Is undergoing a 'revolution of substance'.
Stevens's poem is then interpreted as m Important illustration
of this "conventional revolution*1, end the tape conclude* with *
second reading of the poem, this tins by the poet. Half-hour.
